name: Louise_Shelvy
text:
Louise Shelvy
Doctor Louise Shelvy was a physician.
Biography
On February 24, 1989, Shelvy oversaw the condition of Ronette Pulaski, who had been raped in addition to being traumatized by the murder of Laura Palmer, which Ronette had witnessed. When FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper and Sheriff Harry S. Truman came, Ronette spoke the words, "don't go there."
